doc.title: She Sport TV
doc.plot: This exciting womens sports show kicks-off the season with the Watersking US Open and concludes with US Show-Ski Nationals. The show also features the 4 WOW (Women Of Watersports) Sports events (water ski/wake-board events) as well as interviews with many female sports celebrities and event highlights from sports such as surfing, skateboarding, snowboarding, bmx, motocross, auto racing, Olympic bobsledding, windsurfing, extreme snow skiing, jet ski racing and more.
